_header: Next the dark night the gray morrow

BLHar7333.First Lines:
NExt þe derke nyght þe gray morowSo is Ioye next the end
                    of sorow…
BLHar7333.Last Lines:
…Also she made oure lorde god to dyeLo suche a Cast a woman
                    can pleye
